Texts.Chs: 我遇到了一些小偷，他们抢劫了我的补给...我设法追踪小偷到他们的藏身之处，但我自己不能前往。你能帮帮我吗？ ^green;打败他们的^orange;头目^reset;，之后我会奖励你一个我最新的^orange;原型武器^reset;！
Texts.Eng: I've been having issues with thieves intercepting my supplies... I managed to track the thieves to their hideout, but I can't go in there myself. Could you help me out? ^green;Take out their ^orange;leader^reset;, and I'll reward you with one of my latest ^orange;prototype weapons^reset;!

Texts.Chs: 回到位于^orange;远星庇护所^reset;的^orange;阿尤连^reset;处
与^orange;阿尤连^reset;交谈以传送到^orange;盗贼藏身处^reset;
Texts.Eng: Talk to ^orange;Ayurin^reset; to warp down to the ^orange;thieves' hideout^reset;

Texts.Chs: 圣城万荣，我的朋友友！你今天帮了我一个大忙。这是我向你们保证过的武器原型:  我把它称作^orange;阿尤连之怒^reset;！
Texts.Eng: Vas Vha'leih, my friend! You've done me a great service today. Here's the prototype weapon I promised you: I call it ^orange;Ayurin's Wrath^reset;!
